Title: BJD may benefit from Mahanadi row in the panchayat elections
Content: The controversy over sharing of the Mahanadi water has snowballed into a major issue for the ruling Biju Janata Dal as well as the two major Opposition parties – the Congress and the BJP. It is likely
Author: Prafulla Das
